title: support for Operators which calcite dont support
body:
Ref #24200

I have added support for Operators through Calcite method calls which calcite don't support natively.
SqlCaseIDs ;-
1.select_where_with_bit_expr_with_ampersand
2.select_where_with_bit_expr_with_caret
3.select_where_with_bit_expr_with_div
4.select_where_with_bit_expr_with_signed_left_shift
5.select_where_with_bit_expr_with_signed_right_shift

title: For #25871, support transactionalReadQueryStrategy for readwrite_splitting RDL.
body:
For #25871.

Changes proposed in this pull request:
  - Remove useless `autoAwareResource` from `ReadwriteSplittingRuleSegment`
  - Add `transactionalReadQueryStrategy` to `ReadwriteSplittingRuleSegment`
  - Add optional `TRANSACTIONAL_READ_QUERY_STRATEGY` to RDL syntax
  - Update test cases

```sql
CREATE READWRITE_SPLITTING RULE ms_group_0 (
    WRITE_STORAGE_UNIT=write_ds,
    READ_STORAGE_UNITS(read_ds_0,read_ds_1),
    TRANSACTIONAL_READ_QUERY_STRATEGY='PRIMARY',
    TYPE(NAME="random")
);


ALTER READWRITE_SPLITTING RULE ms_group_0 (
    WRITE_STORAGE_UNIT=write_ds,
    READ_STORAGE_UNITS(read_ds_0,read_ds_1),
    TRANSACTIONAL_READ_QUERY_STRATEGY='PRIMARY',
    TYPE(NAME="random")
);
```
---

Before committing this PR, I'm sure that I have checked the following options:
- [x] My code follows the [code of conduct](https://shardingsphere.apache.org/community/en/involved/conduct/code/) of this project.
